name: Death Runner (Wolderado)
description:
You've made a deal with Death. Destroy souls from both worlds until your endless contract is done.

This game was made by one person for #EpicMegaJam2022 in 7 days. 

How to Play:
  • Left Mouse Button or Space to Attack
  • A/D to Move Horizontally
  • Destroy Souls to Gain Score
Tools I've Used:
  • Unreal Engine 5
  • Blender
  • Photoshop
  • Audacity

Musics don't belong to me. You can find the attribution in the game files

If you're having trouble with FPS, try downloading Lower Graphics build.
